title: Specmatic Configuration
description:
Configuration file for Specmatic, a contract-driven testing tool
https://specmatic.io/documentation/

ignoreInlineExamples.description: Whether to ignore inline examples in specifications

additionalExampleParamsFilePath.description: Path to additional example parameters file

attributeSelectionPattern.description: Pattern for selecting attributes in responses

ContractConfig.title: ContractConfig
ContractConfig.description: Defines a contract source and its provides/consumes configuration.

branch.description: Branch name in the git repository.

provides.description: List of specs provided for testing. Each entry can be a string or an object.

consumes.description: List of specs consumed for stubbing. Each entry can be a string or an object.

bearer-file.description: Path to file containing bearer token

bearer-environment-variable.description: Environment variable name containing bearer token

ReportFormatterDetails.description: Configuration for a specific report formatter

lite.description: Whether to generate a lite version of the report

logo.description: Path to logo image for the report

excludedEndpoints.description: List of endpoints to exclude from coverage

maxMissedEndpointsInSpec.description: Maximum number of missed endpoints allowed

enforce.description: Whether to enforce the success criteria

allowExtensibleSchema.description: Whether to allow extensible schema validation

strictMode.description: Whether to enable strict mode for contract testing

enable.description: Level of resiliency tests to enable

delayInMilliseconds.description: Delay to add to stub responses in milliseconds

dictionary.description: Path to dictionary file for generative stubbing

includeMandatoryAndRequestedKeysInRespon.description: Whether to include mandatory and requested keys in response

startTimeoutInMilliseconds.description: Timeout for stub server startup in milliseconds

strictMode.description: Whether to enable strict mode for stubbing

nonPatchableKeys.description: List of keys that cannot be patched

WorkflowIDOperation.description: Configuration for ID operations in workflow

use.description: JSONPath expression to use extracted ID

AttributeSelectionPattern.description: Pattern for selecting attributes in API responses

query_param_key.description: Query parameter key for field selection
